control_attributes.Control: AC-4 (11) CONFIGURATION OF SECURITY POLICY FILTERS
control_attributes.control_description: The information system provides the capability for privileged administrators to configure [Assignment: organization-defined security policy filters] to support different security policies.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization authorizes network access to [Assignment: organization-defined privileged commands] only for [Assignment: organization-defined compelling operational needs] and documents the rationale for such access in the security plan for the information system.

Control Statement: The information system provides the capability for privileged administrators to configure [Assignment: organization-defined security policy filters] to support different security policies.
Control Name: AC-4 (11) CONFIGURATION OF SECURITY POLICY FILTERS
